item.creatorsgadgets.toolbox_radar.toolt: Displays the _distance_ to nearby _Toolboxes_. Shows Toolboxes _beyond_ their accessible range.
Helps locate _Toolboxes_ you may have lost.
item.creatorsgadgets.toolbox_resonator.t: Displays the _distance_ to nearby _Toolboxes_. Shows Toolboxes _beyond_ their accessible range.
Makes it easier to forget where you placed your _Toolbox_, and helps you find it again.
